name: LD 47: The Sun Wants a Hug
name_original: LD 47: The Sun Wants a Hug
description:
The Sun Wants a Hug!

Unfortunately, your spaceship is not equipped for sun-hugs. Destroy asteroids and satellites to collect resources: green galacti-coal to keep your ship in orbit and blue iso-fuel to power your thrusters and escape the sun's deadly orbit! 

  • WASD moves your ship 
  • Spacebar (tap or hold) to fire your blasters

Your missed shots will remain in orbit and can damage your ship. Watch your back!

"The Sun Wants a Hug" is a project by Black Totem Games @blacktotemgames on Twitter. If you liked our game, give us a follow! We have two long-term projects in the works that we are eager to show people!

Resources Used:
- FL Studio 20
- Audacity
- GameMaker Studio 2.3
- Clip Studio Paint
- Inkscape
